name: Bloons TD Clicker Edition 1
description:
Welcome to bloon's TD clicker edition a game where you click bloon's and pop them and get upgrades like towers, powers, etc and thats basically it a Bloons TD clicker fangame

I originally uploaded this on game jolt to so here's the link for that cause I dont want to type another long description or copy and paste the other one from gamejolt this project was made for fun and I'm not taking this to seriously

https://gamejolt.com/games/BTDCE1/626484

If your looking for some random games to play check out my game library on gamejolt
